sentences.english: Long, long ago there was a war between the birds and beasts.
sentences.chinese: 很久很久以前，鳥類和獸類間發生了一場戰爭。

sentences.english: This veterinary product is very effective in preventing animal molt.
sentences.chinese: 這種獸藥對於防治獸類掉毛很有效。

sentences.english: This veterinary product is very effective in preventing molt.
sentences.chinese: 這種獸藥對於防治獸類掉毛很有效。

sentences.english: A total 6 species of chigger mites were collected from 5 species of rodents and insectivores.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，當地5種小獸類體外共有6種寄生恙蟎。

sentences.english: The desert animals can hide themselves from the heat during the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 沙漠中的獸類能躲避白天的炎熱天氣。

sentences.english: Anomodonts lived both on the surface of the ground and in trees.
sentences.chinese: 異齒獸類生活在地面和樹林中。

sentences.english: The chair is said to be the most efficient at controlling the beast.
sentences.chinese: 據說椅子是防禦獸類攻擊的最佳道具。

sentences.english: They used simple tools with the help of some animals, mostly cattle.
sentences.chinese: 他們使用簡單的工具並且靠獸類特別是靠牛來幫助。

sentences.english: Tigers and cats belong to the same family of beasts.
sentences.chinese: 虎與貓在獸類中屬於同一科。

sentences.english: Objective To study the population structure of small mammals in Eryuan Dali.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查大理州洱源縣小獸類哺乳動物種羣結構。

definition: to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
to convert an enemy into a friend (idiom)
supplementary cash reserve/private fund/private hoard/slush fund
it will cause no end of trouble (idiom)
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
fight a battle of words/cross verbal swords
to force someone to do something
